mapper.update: update recruit set title=#{title}, deadline=#{deadline}, people=#{people}, gender=#{gender}, age=#{age}, school=#{school}, special=#{special}, salary=#{salary}, w_date=#{w_date}, w_day=#{w_day}, w_time=#{w_time}, job=#{job}, work=#{work}, benefit=#{benefit}, contents=#{contents}, fname=#{fname}, oname=#{oname} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from recruit order by id) R
select * from (select * from recruit order by id) where num=#{num}
mapper.update: update recruit set num=#{num}, id=#{id}, title=#{title}, deadline=#{deadline}, people=#{people}, gender=#{gender}, age=#{age}, school=#{school}, special=#{special}, salary=#{salary}, w_date=#{w_date}, w_day=#{w_day}, w_time=#{w_time}, job=#{job}, work=#{work}, benefit=#{benefit}, contents=#{contents} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from area_code order by code_num asc
